name: Dating with Dinosaurs
description:
Dating with Dinosaurs, is a visual novel about dating dinosaurs (wow), to become the hottest human on dino academy. While dating the dinosaurs play minigames to show you mean it.

Date with Terry the Tyrannosaurus Rex, he might look scary but he's a real sweetheart under those big teeth.

Date with Percy the Pteranodon, she loves sport and exercise but has a dark secret.

Controls
Flappy Bird: Space
Brachio Climb : Space
Meteor Shower: A-D to move, Mouse click to shoot

Artist:
Robin Jordans
Mila Jelsma
David de Kieviet

Dev's
Tristan Liska
Ginn Korngold
